name: Coloring Book for Dinosaur
description:
Dinosaur Coloring Book is one of the best dino painting game for kids and adults. This coloring book for any age contains lots of dinosaur pictures: Tyrannosaurus dinos, Triceratops dinos, Brontosaurus dino, Stegosaurus dino, Velociraptor dino, fantastic dino battles and tens of other cool and realistic dinosaurs. Every fan of dinosaurs will love painting dino coloring pages of this cool coloring book.

Features:
- Download this app, today it is for free;
- Coloring book created for boys and men, girls and women any age, from 3 to years old!
- Cute and cool design;
- Good for relaxing and creativity development;
- Contains tens of coloring pages of dinosaurs;
- Adapted for smartphones and tablets, any screen resolution;
- Share results on Facebook, Instagram and other social apps;

Have fun and a creative moment with dinosaur coloring pages for kids App!
